references.paper_title: Hifi++: a unified framework for bandwidth extension and speech enhancement
references.reason: This paper introduces the HiFi++ architecture, which is the basis for the model developed in this paper.

references.paper_title: wav2vec 2.0: A framework for self-supervised learning of speech representations
references.reason: This paper introduces WavLM, a large self-supervised speech pre-training model which is used as a backbone in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: WavLM: Large-scale self-supervised pre-training for full stack speech processing
references.reason: This paper introduces WavLM, which is used as a backbone for perceptual loss in the proposed method.
This paper introduces MS-STFT adversarial training pipeline, which is used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Universal speech enhancement with score-based diffusion
references.reason: This paper introduces the UNIVERSE dataset and compares against diffusion models for speech enhancement
